## AccountManager.fetchByNameAndTag() method

Fetch a RIOT account by its name and tag.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetchByNameAndTag(name: string, tag: string, options?: {
        force: boolean;
    }): Promise<Account>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of this RIOT account. |
|  tag | string | The tag of this RIOT account. |
|  options | { force: boolean; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The basic fetching options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Account](./shieldbow.account.md)<!-- -->&gt;
